name: Your Fate
description:
A game created for itch.io Mini Jam 96: Fate. The theme of this game is fate, as it is your fate to be caught. The limitation of this game is losing, where you may not want to lose but a friend or someone may be glad when you lose so they can get a high score better than yours and vice versa.

Use your mouse to control your character and whatever you do, don't get caught.

Make game full screen to play.
